subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh, the No. 2 overall pick by the Detroit Lions two seasons ago, has a rare combination of strength and speed, as well as a reputation for dirty play.
snippet: Defensive tackle Ndamukong Suh, the No. 2 overall pick by the Detroit Lions two seasons ago, has a rare combination of strength and speed, as well as a reputation for dirty play.
